name: Devout
description:
Faith Guides All
Devout cultures are deeply religious societies organized around spiritual beliefs. They value piety, community service, and adherence to moral codes. Faith provides structure, meaning, and purpose to every aspect of life.

culturalRestrictions.name: Guaranteed Mercy
culturalRestrictions.description: Your faith demands compassion - even for enemies. If you or your allies kill a helpless or surrendering opponent or refuse a plea for mercy, you lose 2 resolve.

culturalRestrictions.name: Temperance
culturalRestrictions.description: Your faith does not allow you to partake in certain activities such as consuming mind-alterting substances, gambling or lying. If you do so, you lose 1 resolve.

benefits.name: Blessing Ceremony
benefits.description: When you would and your allies would eat a meal that causes a morale increase, you can bless it causing it to grant an additional morale for you and those who participate in the ceremony.

benefits.name: Donation
benefits.description: When you have at least 5 resolve, you can donate either money or valuable items to an institution or shrine of your faith. For each 100 gold of valuation you donate, you gain 1 resolve.

startingItems.name: Holy Icon
startingItems.description: A minor relic of your faith that can be used to replace a spell component in any spell, but it is consumed in the process. This icon can also be shown to validate you as a member of your faith or culture.

startingItems.name: Book of Hymns
startingItems.description: You have a hymn book which allows you to automatically learn the song of worship.

startingItems.name: Pilgrim's Cloak
startingItems.description: A cloak that identifies you as a relgious traveler. Most cultures consider it dishonorable to attack a pilgrim, but it is equally dishonorable to start a conflict while wearing the pilgrim's cloak.
